scenarios.name: Create theater business
scenarios.prompt: insert into bizes id = biz_seatmap_uc18 name = DowntownTheater slug = downtown-theater-uc18 status = active timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create location
scenarios.prompt: insert into locations id = loc_uc18 biz_id = biz_seatmap_uc18 name = TheaterBuilding slug = theater-building timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create theater venue
scenarios.prompt: insert into venues id = ven_theater_uc18 biz_id = biz_seatmap_uc18 location_id = loc_uc18 name = TheaterHall slug = theater-hall setup_minutes = 30 teardown_minutes = 30

scenarios.name: Create theater resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_theater_uc18 biz_id = biz_seatmap_uc18 location_id = loc_uc18 type = venue venue_id = ven_theater_uc18 name = TheaterHallResource slug = theater-hall-resource timezone = America/Los_Angeles capacity = 200 allow_simultaneous_bookings = true max_simultaneous_bookings = 200

scenarios.name: Create seat map
scenarios.prompt: insert into seat_maps id = sm_theater biz_id = biz_seatmap_uc18 name = TheaterLayout slug = theater-layout status = active target_type = resource resource_id = res_theater_uc18 timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create orchestra seat
scenarios.prompt: insert into seat_map_seats id = sm_seat_a1 biz_id = biz_seatmap_uc18 seat_map_id = sm_theater seat_key = A-1 section_key = orchestra row_label = A column_label = 1 grid_x = 1 grid_y = 1 status = active capacity = 1

scenarios.name: Create accessible seat
scenarios.prompt: insert into seat_map_seats id = sm_seat_wc biz_id = biz_seatmap_uc18 seat_map_id = sm_theater seat_key = WC-1 section_key = orchestra row_label = W column_label = 1 grid_x = 2 grid_y = 1 is_accessible = true status = active capacity = 1

scenarios.name: Create event offer
scenarios.prompt: insert into offers id = ofr_event_uc18 biz_id = biz_seatmap_uc18 name = EveningShowOffer slug = evening-show-offer execution_mode = slot status = active is_published = true timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create event offer version
scenarios.prompt: insert into offer_versions id = ov_event_uc18 biz_id = biz_seatmap_uc18 offer_id = ofr_event_uc18 version = 1 status = published duration_mode = fixed default_duration_min = 120 min_duration_min = 120 max_duration_min = 120 base_price_minor = 5000 currency = USD

scenarios.name: Create service product
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_products id = sp_event_uc18 biz_id = biz_seatmap_uc18 name = TheaterSeatProduct slug = theater-seat-product kind = booking duration_mode = fixed default_duration_minutes = 120 base_price_amount = 5000 currency = USD status = active is_published = true

scenarios.name: Create front row seat type
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_product_seat_types id = spst_front_uc18 biz_id = biz_seatmap_uc18 service_product_id = sp_event_uc18 name = FrontRow slug = front-row is_default = true min_seats = 0 max_seats = 10 default_quantity = 1 base_price_amount = 9500 currency = USD status = active

scenarios.name: Create standard seat type
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_product_seat_types id = spst_standard_uc18 biz_id = biz_seatmap_uc18 service_product_id = sp_event_uc18 name = Standard slug = standard is_default = false min_seats = 0 max_seats = 200 default_quantity = 1 base_price_amount = 5000 currency = USD status = active

scenarios.name: Create customer user
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_seat_customer_uc18 email = seat.customer.uc18@example.com name = SeatCustomer status = active

scenarios.name: Create seat hold
scenarios.prompt: insert into seat_holds id = sh_uc18_001 biz_id = biz_seatmap_uc18 seat_map_id = sm_theater seat_map_seat_id = sm_seat_a1 holder_user_id = usr_seat_customer_uc18 hold_type = checkout hold_state = held held_at = 2026-02-22T10:00:00Z expires_at = 2026-02-22T10:10:00Z
